DOC.brief_summary: Compare data (structural and functional) obtained by transthoracic rest echocardiography and magnetic resonance imaging (with gadolinium) in 30 patients with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Data Obtained by Echocardiography and Magnetic Resonance Imaging in Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy
DOC.detailed_description: All data from consecutive patients with HCM explored by 2D-echo or MRI in our institution will be analyzed blindly by a senior echocardiographist and a senior radiologist to highlights the respective interest of each of these examinations for the detection of structural or functional abnormalities in HCM.
DOC.criteria: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy Age > 18 years Pregnancy Pacemaker IACD Allergy to gadolinium Secondary hypertrophy
